Sentencas: An (Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel layer effectively suppresses Cr outward diffusion, but the occurrence of spallation between coating and metal interfaces and the increasing oxidation rate over time significantly deteriorate cell performance.
Titulo: Formation of sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)3O4 spinel and its electrical properties

Sentencas: A transition metal cation, particularly Cu, is added into the (Mn,Co)(3)O-4 to improve the long-term stability of the interconnect materials for low-to-intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Formation of sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)3O4 spinel and its electrical properties

Sentencas: In this work, fine-crystalline (Cu,Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel powders with an average crystallite size of 21 nm were successfully synthesized via the citric acid-nitrate method.
Titulo: Formation of sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)3O4 spinel and its electrical properties

Sentencas: The potential for use as a coating material for low-to-intermediate-temperature SOFC interconnects was explored.
Titulo: Formation of sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)3O4 spinel and its electrical properties

Sentencas: According to the TG curves, IR spectra, and XRD patterns, 800 degrees C is recommended as the minimum calcination temperature for (Cu,Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel materials.
Titulo: Formation of sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)3O4 spinel and its electrical properties

Sentencas: Compared with (Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel materials, the addition of Cu does not induce significant changes in the crystal structure but markedly improves the electrical conductivity (116 Scrn(-1)) and the activation energy (0.394 eV) of the (Cu,Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel.
Titulo: Formation of sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)3O4 spinel and its electrical properties

Sentencas: Overall, the sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel can be used as a coating material for low-to-intermediate-temperature SOFC interconnects and is superior to (Mn,Co)(3)O-4 spinel because high electrical conductivity is preferred to minimize ohmic losses between the electrodes of adjacent cells.
Titulo: Formation of sol-gel derived (Cu,Mn,Co)3O4 spinel and its electrical properties
